title: Machine Learning Engineer
description:
AICore Labs is Seeking a Machine Learning Engineer (Full-Time)

AICore Labs, a Tokyo-based AI firm, develops solutions for clients in healthcare and finance. We’re looking for a Machine Learning Engineer to build innovative AI models.

About the Role
You’ll design and deploy machine learning applications, working with data scientists to deliver solutions.

Your Tasks

  • Develop ML models using TensorFlow.
    - Refine algorithms with teams.
    - Integrate ML solutions with systems.
    - Optimize model performance.
    - Document solutions.
    - Conduct testing for reliability.
    - Stay updated on ML trends.
    - Train clients on ML tools.
    - Support AI strategy.
    - Participate in code reviews.

Qualifications
We need candidates with 3–5 years of experience in machine learning, proficient in TensorFlow, PyTorch, or Python. Cloud platform experience and problem-solving skills are essential. A Bachelor’s degree in computer science or a related field is required.

Why AICore?
We’re innovators in AI. Our hybrid work model offers flexibility, and we provide training and tools. You’ll work on impactful projects in a collaborative environment.

Perks
Health insurance
Commuter allowance
20 days of annual leave
AI training budget
AI tools access
Team events

Apply Now
Join AICore Labs to shape AI’s future. Submit your application today!
